title: Strengthening AI Practical Competencies: Design Thinking-Based Technology-Enhanced Learning for Mathematics Education

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can design math learning problem scenarios using interview techniques during the empathy stage of the design thinking process.
Learners can prototype creative math problem-solving solutions using technological tools.
Learners can iteratively improve math education design prototypes based on peer feedback.
